powerups.name: Ammo
powerups.description: Increases ammunition.

powerups.name: Aphotic Shield
powerups.description: Absorbs all hits taken and releasing them all at once on timeout.

powerups.name: Chain
powerups.description: Projectiles jump to nearby target on hit.

powerups.name: Concussive Shell
powerups.description: Each projectile hit applies a stacking slow debuff.

powerups.name: Faster Projectile
powerups.description: Increases projectile speed.

powerups.name: Fireworks
powerups.description: Projectiles explode into lesser projectiles at a randomized travel distance.

powerups.name: Gold Coin
powerups.description: Gives one coin.

powerups.name: Haste
powerups.description: Increases movement speed.

powerups.name: Homing Missile
powerups.description: Projectiles track and target the nearest enemy tank.

powerups.name: Increased Armor
powerups.description: Increases armor.

powerups.name: Increased Critical Chance
powerups.description: Increases the chance to score a critical hit.

powerups.name: Increased Damage
powerups.description: Increases damage.

powerups.name: Kinetic Shell
powerups.description: Knockbacks on hit.

powerups.name: Multi Shot
powerups.description: Adds extra projectiles to the normal attack.

powerups.name: Projectile Barrier
powerups.description: Accumulates a spinning barrier of deadly projectiles for every hit taken.

powerups.name: Random
powerups.description: Transforms into a random powerup on pickup.

powerups.name: Rapid Fire
powerups.description: Increases the rate of fire.

powerups.name: Reactive Armor
powerups.description: Each hit taken increases armor.

powerups.name: Regeneration
powerups.description: Restores health to full in increments. Cancelled when hit.

powerups.name: Return
powerups.description: Each hit is returned.

powerups.name: Time Dilation Sphere
powerups.description: Projectiles that enter the effective radius is slowed by 90 percent.

powerups.name: Nuke
powerups.description: Launches a nuclear strike that deals massive damage. Ignores shields.

powerups.name: Deflect
powerups.description: Deflects incoming projectiles using shield energy. With enough velocity, projectiles can punch through the shield.

powerups.name: Point Defense Laser
powerups.description: Destroys incoming projectiles using shield energy.

powerups.name: Impulse Shell
powerups.description: Deals extra damage based on distance travelled by projectile.

powerups.name: Mine
powerups.description: Deals damage to a small area when triggered.

powerups.name: Carpet Bomb
powerups.description: Calls a C-130 Carpet Bomber to lay waste on an area. Direction relies on turret facing angle.

powerups.name: Armor Piercing Shell
powerups.description: Each projectile hit reduces armor by 5.

tanks.name: Heavy
tanks.description: A bulky tank that can absorb more hits in exchange for slower movement.

tanks.name: Jagdpanther
tanks.description: A hard-hitting tank destroyer but a slow moving tank.

tanks.name: M4-Sherman
tanks.description: A light tank that can move swiftly but deal less damage and is fragile.

tanks.name: M4-Sherman Blue
tanks.description: A light tank similar to the original M4 Sherman but improves on its shield.

tanks.name: Widower
tanks.description: A fast-moving tank and a hard-hitter. Collision size is huge.

tanks.name: Fafnir
tanks.description: A tank destroyer that is able to deal quadruple damage 50% of the time.

tanks.name: Type 75
tanks.description: A heavy tank destroyer that sports a fast-regenerating shield.

tanks.name: M1A1 Abrams
tanks.description: A main battletank that is both heavily-armed and armored while still being mobile.

tanks.name: Tiger II
tanks.description: A main battletank that can aborb a huge amount of damage and deal the same.

tanks.name: T72-120
tanks.description: A main battletank that has good armor and great shield. Deals a great amount of damage but has a lower critical hit multiplier.

tanks.name: Merkava Mk.IV
tanks.description: A main battletank that has a ton of health, shield regeneration and deals a massive amount of damage per shell.
